text_kor: 후, 오늘 산책길도 얼마 안 남았네.
text_eng: Phew, the walk is just around the corner today.
This hill is piece of cake!

text_kor: 등불을 밝힐때면 무슨 일이 일어나곤 해.
text_eng: Something happens when light a lamp.

text_kor: 저 위로 올라가려면 등불을 밝혀야 하지.
text_eng: And to get up there, have to light a lamp.
It ignites with magic(Q)!

text_kor:
망각의 꽃은 항상 편안한 기분이 들게끔 도와줘.
고통, 슬픔, 외로움...같은 것에서 말이야.
text_eng:
The flower of oblivion always helps me you feel comfortable.
Pain, sadness, loneliness...From the same thing.

text_kor:
...자꾸 혼잣말을 하게 되는데,
내가 정신 나간 건 아니겠지?! 꽃이 필요해!
text_eng:
...I keep talking to myself...
Am I crazy?! I need flowers!

text_kor:
저 검은 녀석들, 얼마 전부터 나타나기
시작했는데...생명체일까?
text_eng: Those dark things have recently shown up....Is it a creature?

text_kor:
나 외의 생물을 보는 건 처음인데...
암튼 다가가면 물려고 했었지!
text_eng:
I've never seen anything other than myself...
Anyway, that tried to bite me when I getting close!
I'll crush it with a jump!
Oh...I forgot to fix the ladder.

text_kor: 어쩔 수 없지, 점프로 벽을 차면서 올라가야겠어.
text_eng: I can't help it, I have no choice to 'wall jump.'
What the...!
Ominous...I need to go home quickly.

text_kor:
얼마 전까진 길이 이렇지 않았는데...
지반이 불안정하니 조심해야해.
text_eng:
The road wasn't like this a while ago...
The ground is unstable, so be careful.
Wow, I've never seen that like that before...!

text_kor:
암튼 쟤들이 쏘는 것에 맞으면
좋을 것 같진 않네.
text_eng: Well, I don't think it's good to be hit by what they're shooting at.

text_kor:
다녀왔어요, 프레스톤 씨!
오늘은 산책하는데 검은 녀석들이
더 늘어난 것 같아서 걱정돼요...
text_eng:
I'm back, Mr.Prestone!
I'm worried that there are more dark creatures than yesterday.

text_kor:
이러다가 쟤네들이 우리 집까지
오면 어떡하죠...?!
text_eng: What if they come to my house like this...?!

text_kor:
아, 바다 보는 걸 잊었다구요?
네, 빨리 보러가요!
text_eng:
Oh, we forgot to see the ocean?
Yes, let's go see it!

text_kor: 저 소리...왠지 저 섬이 날 부르는 것 같아요.
text_eng: That sound...I feel like that island is calling me.
...Mr.Prestone, even if this place is surrounded by darkness,

text_kor: 마지막까지 저랑 항상 함께한다고 약속해주세요...너무 무서워요...
text_eng: promise me you'll always be with me until the end...I'm so scared...
...What will happen to us?
Mr.Prestone...Dark clouds are getting thicker.
...And I feeling something deep inside this island.
What the hell are they?

text_kor: 사람들의 꿈을 통해서 물건들이 넘어오긴 하지만 '생물 같은 건' 처음이잖아요?
text_eng:
Something comes through people's dreams,
but it's the first time comes 'like creature,' right?

text_kor: 그렇다고 대화가 가능한 것 같지도 않고...무엇 때문에 여기저기 들쑤시는지도 모르겠고!
text_eng:
But it doesn't seem like a conversation is possible,
and I don't know what's causing here all the trouble!
We cannot escape that forever...
Eek!
Huck! Run away, Mr. Prestone!
Phew...Did we shake them off...?
Yikes!
Mr.Prestone!!
Hey, stop!
Mr.Prestone...

text_kor:
...그래, 도망만 다닐 수는 없어...!
갈게요, 프레스톤 씨!
text_eng:
...Yeah, I can't just run away...!
I'm coming, Mr.Prestone!

text_kor: 검은 기운이 더 진해졌어...분명 이 앞에 먹구름이 있을 거야.
text_eng:
The dark energy has gotten strong...
there must be a dark cloud in front of me.
Hey! Give Mr.Prestone back!
That sound, it's from you!
Heck! the cave is shaking!
No! Wait!
Gone...

text_kor: 프레스톤 씨...아무리 그냥 돌이라고 해도 내 유일한 친구야...
text_eng: Mr.Prestone...No matter how just stone is, he's my only friend.

text_kor: 검은 녀석들...갑자기 쳐들어 와서는 내 세상을 망쳐놓다니...!
text_eng: Dark things...How dare comes in and ruins my world!

text_kor: 이 땅에서 저 놈들을 다 없애버리겠어!
text_eng: I'm going to destroy them all in this land!

text_kor: ...저 방향이면 분명 '방울 섬'으로 갔겠지? 모든 것이 모이는 장소니까.
text_eng:
That direction...would have gone to the Bubble Island.
Because It's a place where everything gathers.

...Wait for me, Mr.Prestone.
I'll go save you!
